## Ignore Visual Studio generated files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
*.vscode/

## Build outputs
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]og/

## NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuget
packages/
*.sln.ide/
.nuget/

## Auto-generated database files
*.ldf
DVLD.mdf
DVLD_Template_log.ldf

## IMPORTANT: Do NOT ignore the template db inside Database/
!Database/DVLD_Template.mdf

## VS Backup
*.bak

## Rider / ReSharper
.idea/
*.DotSettings.user

## Publish folder
publish/

## Others
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.pdb
*.tlog
*.vs/
.vs/

## Ignore SQL runtime instances
*log
*.mdf
*.ldf
!Database/DVLD_Template.mdf
